AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Recent_ActionHistory
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select Requestreqaction from Escm_Materialrequest_Hist where Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@ order by created desc limit 1

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_SMIRequest_Header
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists(select 1 from Escm_Material_Reqln where Escm_Material_Request_ID = @Escm_Material_Request_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Requisition_HasOrder
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists(select 1 from m_requisitionorder as reqord join m_requisitionline ln on ln.m_requisitionline_id=reqord.m_requisitionline_id join m_requisition req on req.m_requisition_id=ln.m_requisition_id where req.m_requisition_id =@M_Requisition_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Login
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select count(m_inout_id) from m_inout where m_inout_id = @M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_IsInspected
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select count(escm_inspection_id) from escm_inspection where isinspected ='N' and escm_inspection_id=@ESCM_Inspection_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_SMIRequest_Login_User
ESCM_IssueRequest_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request Req WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Escm_Material_Request Req LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = Req.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_ROLE_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@ AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@) AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_MatReqLinePendQty
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT COUNT(escm_material_reqln_id) from escm_material_reqln where escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@ and pending_qty > 0

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_MIR_Header_Count
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT COUNT(escm_material_request_id) from escm_material_request where escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Item_Desc
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when description is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end from m_product where m_product_id =@M_Product_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Login_User
CustodyWorkbench
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: CWB

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Last_Performer
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from m_inout where exists( select 1 from ESCM_Custodytransfer_Hist hist join m_inout req on hist.m_inout_id=req.m_inout_id where hist.m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@ and hist.createdby =@#AD_User_ID@ and hist.ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@) and m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@ and em_escm_docstatus='ESCM_IP'

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: SiteMaterialIssueRequest
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: Y

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_inventory_have_line
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when count(m_inventoryline_id) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end from m_inventoryline invl where invl.m_inventory_id=@M_Inventory_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_CT_LoginUser
ESCM_IssueRequest_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request Req WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Escm_Material_Request Req LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = Req.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_ROLE_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@ AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@) AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_RECENT_HISTORY
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select Requestreqaction from Escm_Materialrequest_Hist where Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@ order by created desc limit 1

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: MaterialIssueRequest
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: MIR

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Role_Has_DocumentRule
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request Req WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from eut_documentrule_header hd join eut_documentrule_lines ln on hd.eut_documentrule_header_id=ln.eut_documentrule_header_id where hd.document_type=(select escm_documenttype from Escm_Material_Request where Escm_Material_Request_id = @Escm_Material_Request_ID@) and (hd.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ or hd.ad_org_id='0' ) and ln.ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@) AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_CTRECENT_HISTORY
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select requestreqaction from escm_custodytransfer_hist where m_inout_id=@m_inout_id@ order by created desc limit 1

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: WHKeeper
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select value from ad_preference where (property = 'ESCM_WarehouseKeeper' or property = 'ESCM_LineManager' or property='ESCM_Inventory_Control') and ispropertylist = 'Y' and visibleat_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Custody_Has_Lines
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists (select 1 from m_inoutline where m_inout_id = @M_INOUT_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Custody_Header_Status
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL= select req.status from escm_mrequest_custody cy join escm_material_reqln ln on ln.escm_material_reqln_id=cy.escm_material_reqln_id join escm_material_request req on req.escm_material_request_id=ln.escm_material_request_id where ln.escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Inventory
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: Y

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_IsCustody_Transfer
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: Y

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Have_Return
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when count(escm_return_id) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end from escm_return where m_inout_id = @M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Custody
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select value from escm_deflookups_typeln where escm_deflookups_typeln_id = @EM_Escm_Stock_Type@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_POReceipt
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: PO

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: LostandDamaged
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: LD

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Have_IR
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when count(escm_initialreceipt_id) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end from escm_initialreceipt where m_inout_id = @M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Requisition_Login_User
Escm_Requisition_Delegation
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM m_requisition req WHERE EXISTS(select 1 from eut_docapp_delegate dl join eut_docapp_delegateln dll on dl.eut_docapp_delegate_id = dll.eut_docapp_delegate_id where dll.ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@ and dll.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and dll.document_type = 'EUT_111' and now() between dl.from_date and dl.to_date and dl.ad_role_id in ( select li.ad_role_id from m_requisition re join eut_next_role rl on re.em_eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id join eut_next_role_line li on li.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id and re.m_requisition_id =@M_Requisition_ID@)) AND req.m_requisition_id=@M_Requisition_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Requester
ESCM_IssueRequest_Login_User
WHKeeper
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select value from ad_preference where (property = 'ESCM_WarehouseKeeper' or property = 'ESCM_LineManager' or property='ESCM_Inventory_Control') and ispropertylist = 'Y' and visibleat_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ReturnTransaction
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: RT

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Requisition_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM M_Requisition Req WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_Requisition Req LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = Req.EM_EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_ROLE_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@ AND Req.M_Requisition_ID=@M_Requisition_ID@) AND Req.M_Requisition_ID=@M_Requisition_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Header_WH_Type
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select em_escm_warehouse_type from m_warehouse where m_warehouse_id=@M_Warehouse_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_SMlReq_Delegation
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM escm_material_request req WHERE EXISTS(select 1 from eut_docapp_delegate dl join eut_docapp_delegateln dll on dl.eut_docapp_delegate_id = dll.eut_docapp_delegate_id where dll.ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@ and dll.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and dll.document_type = 'EUT_112' and now() between dl.from_date and dl.to_date and dl.ad_role_id in ( select li.ad_role_id from escm_material_request re join eut_next_role rl on re.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id join eut_next_role_line li on li.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id and re.escm_material_request_id =@Escm_Material_Request_ID@)) AND req.escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_PurReq_LogUser
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'N' from M_Requisition where not exists(select 1 from M_Requisition where M_Requisition_ID = @M_Requisition_ID@ and createdby = @#AD_User_ID@ and em_escm_ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ ) and M_Requisition_ID = @M_Requisition_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_Inventory
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: N

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_MaterialIssueReq_Delegation
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM escm_material_request req WHERE EXISTS(select 1 from eut_docapp_delegate dl join eut_docapp_delegateln dll on dl.eut_docapp_delegate_id = dll.eut_docapp_delegate_id where dll.ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@ and dll.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and dll.document_type = 'EUT_112' and now() between dl.from_date and dl.to_date and dl.ad_role_id in ( select li.ad_role_id from escm_material_request re join eut_next_role rl on re.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id join eut_next_role_line li on li.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id and re.escm_material_request_id =@Escm_Material_Request_ID@)) AND req.escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_ChkHeaderId
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select count(m_inout_id) from m_inout where m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_MIR_LoginUser_Role
ESCM_MIR_ReturnWarehouse
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request WHERE EXISTS(select 1 from m_warehouse wh where wh.em_escm_warehouse_type='RTW' and wh.m_warehouse_id=@M_Warehouse_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Product_Have_Characteristic
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when count(m_product_ch_id) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end from m_product_ch where m_product_id =@M_Product_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_CT_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM m_inout ct WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM m_inout ct LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = ct.EM_EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_USER_ID=@#AD_User_ID@ AND ct.M_Inout_ID=@M_Inout_ID@) AND ct.M_Inout_ID=@M_Inout_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: IssueReturnTransactioncount
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select count(m_inoutline_id) from m_inoutline where m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Role_Has_DocumentRule
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request Req WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from eut_documentrule_header hd join eut_documentrule_lines ln on hd.eut_documentrule_header_id=ln.eut_documentrule_header_id where hd.document_type='EUT_112' and (hd.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ or hd.ad_org_id='0' ) and ln.ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@) AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ReturnTransactioncount
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select count(m_inoutline_id) from m_inoutline where m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_ItemDesc_Read
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select case when isstocked='Y' and ispurchased='Y' then 'Y' else 'N' end from m_product where m_product_id =@M_Product_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Requisition_Header
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists(select 1 from M_RequisitionLine where M_Requisition_ID = @M_Requisition_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Role_Has_DocumentRule
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM M_Requisition Req WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from eut_documentrule_header hd join eut_documentrule_lines ln on hd.eut_documentrule_header_id=ln.eut_documentrule_header_id where hd.document_type='EUT_111' and (hd.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ or hd.ad_org_id='0' ) and ln.ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@) AND Req.M_Requisition_ID=@M_Requisition_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_SMIR_CreatedBy
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'N' from escm_material_request where not exists(select 1 from escm_material_request where escm_material_request_id = @ESCM_Material_Request_ID@ and createdby = @#AD_User_ID@ and ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@) and escm_material_request_id = @ESCM_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_SMIRequest_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request Req WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Escm_Material_Request Req LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = Req.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_ROLE_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@ AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@) AND Req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_NextRole
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM m_inout Req WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM m_inout Req LEFT JOIN EUT_NEXT_ROLE_LINE RL ON RL.EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID = Req.EM_EUT_NEXT_ROLE_ID WHERE RL.AD_ROLE_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@ AND Req.m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@) AND Req.m_inout_id=@M_InOut_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ActionHistory
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select requestreqaction from escm_custodytransfer_hist where m_inout_id=@m_inout_id@ order by created desc limit 1

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Escm_SMIReq_Delegation
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=SELECT 'Y' FROM escm_material_request req WHERE EXISTS(select 1 from eut_docapp_delegate dl join eut_docapp_delegateln dll on dl.eut_docapp_delegate_id = dll.eut_docapp_delegate_id where dll.ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@ and dll.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and dll.document_type = 'EUT_112' and now() between dl.from_date and dl.to_date and dl.ad_role_id in ( select li.ad_role_id from escm_material_request re join eut_next_role rl on re.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id join eut_next_role_line li on li.eut_next_role_id = rl.eut_next_role_id and re.escm_material_request_id =@Escm_Material_Request_ID@)) AND req.escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: Warehouse_Type
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select em_escm_warehouse_type from m_warehouse where m_warehouse_id=@M_Warehouse_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_IssueRequest_Header
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists(select 1 from Escm_Material_Reqln where Escm_Material_Request_ID = @Escm_Material_Request_ID@)

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: IssueReturnTransaction
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: IRT

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_SHOW_TAG
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL= SELECT 'Y' FROM Escm_Material_Request req where exists ( select 1 from escm_material_reqln ln join m_product prd on prd.m_product_id=ln.m_product_id join (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from escm_deflookups_type lt join escm_deflookups_typeln ltl on ltl.escm_deflookups_type_id=lt.escm_deflookups_type_id where lt.reference='PST' and ltl.value='CUS') cusref on cusref.escm_deflookups_typeln_id=prd.em_escm_stock_type where ln.escm_material_request_id=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@) AND req.Escm_Material_Request_ID=@Escm_Material_Request_ID@

AD_AUXILIARINPUT.NAME: ESCM_Header
AD_AUXILIARINPUT.CODE: @SQL=select 'Y' from dual where exists(select 1 from m_inoutline where m_inout_id = @M_InOut_ID@)
